ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Auto Renewal")), Incremental_ARR__c<>0, CONTAINS(TEXT(StageName), "Won")
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Incremental ARR must be 0 on a Renewal Opportunity. If this is an expansion, churn, or contraction; please update the opportunity type.
